title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.7 - Duties of the Departmental Advisory Committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.7 - Duties of the Departmental Advisory Committee

State Regulations

The Departmental Advisory Committee
shall conduct its activities and carry out the duties enumerated in this Part
pursuant to the bylaws of the Assigned Counsel Plan Central Screening

Committee, set forth in Part 612 of this Title. The Director of the Office of

Attorneys for Children shall be substituted where reference in the bylaws is
made to the administrator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
